channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jim Cramer says our newest stock is a buy after dipping on slow start to 2025
item.description: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Block shares plunge 18%, for worst day on market in 5 years after earnings miss
item.description: Block had its worst day on the stock market since 2020 after the company reported an earnings miss.

item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Walmart's worst week since 2022: Retailer's former U.S. CEO Bill Simon thinks Wall Street is getting earnings, tariff risks wrong
item.description: Walmart is coming off a tough week after delivering a slowing profit growth forecast.

item.title: Buffett says Berkshire will continue to increase investment in Japan trading houses
item.description: Buffett said Berkshire will moderately increase its ownership in the five Japanese trading houses over time.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
